text:
For Kendall Jenner, underwear is outerwear, boobs are a fashion statement, and swimwear looks a lot like a regular outfit. The model is living it up at the Cannes Film Festival, creating style moments all the while — even on her down time. For a paddle boarding session on Wednesday, Jenner was spied in a white long-sleeved jacquard fabric swimsuit with a Bardot shoulder silhouette.

The piece is by Midsommar Swim, and truth be told, looks a lot like something Jenner might wear on any given night out. All you'd need to do is add some bottoms — like short shorts or low-slung jeans — and a cute shoe, and you have the look. Or, as the Kardashian/Jenner crew is wont to do, forget the pants altogether and substitute really, really high boots.

I mean, just look at how flawlessly the swimsuit pairs with a blazer. Put some slim-fitting pants with that outfit and you've got a look that can quite actually take you from the boardwalk to the beach — and a very fancy French one at that. :
title: Kendall Jenner Wears a Long-Sleeved Bardot Swimsuit In Cannes

meta_data.author: Condé Nast
meta_data.description: Kendall Jenner is enjoying herself in Cannes, and looking great while doing so. Her latest piece of swimwear caught our eye, as it looks a lot like something you could also pull off if you're not at the beach.
